post.text: This is a struggle for the survival of OUR nation, and this will be our last chance to save it. We MUST raise our voices on November 8th!

comment.author: Anthony
comment.text: I just want to take a minute to say THANK YOU to Mr. Trump, for deciding to take this journey. I also want to thank your family. I only imagine how much your lives are being disrupted. Thank you for loving our country as much as we do.
